long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever played youtube in the background to listen to some music while studying or watching youtube while eating and suddenly a skippable Ad appears but you can't skip the press button? 


well, This extension aims to automatically skip the skippable Youtube ads, so it makes the youtube experience more focused and content-driven!

Note: This extension doesn't hide or remove all youtube ads, it's only targeting/skips the ads that will be skippable after short amount of time (usually 5s).
